  • Use he/she or one together

  • Do not just use he or she, if we don’t have specific person.

  • Don’t not let limitation of language limit your thoughts.

  • He/she can help you imagine, but one is simple and abstract.

  • For other languages, it is same too. Use 他/她 together or 一个人。

  • I should learn more language to separte he/she.
